title: Adult Income Prediction
description: This project predicts whether a person earns more than $50K per year based on demographic and employment-related features.

title: Sales Forecasting - Kaggle Competition
description: Predicting future sales using advanced machine learning techniques! This project was built for a Kaggle competition, applying XGBoost and LightGBM to forecast sales.

title: Applied grid search cross-validation to optimize model performance
description: Grid Search Cross-Validation (GridSearchCV) to optimize hyperparameters and improve model performance. The project involved training multiple models with different hyperparameter combinations and selecting the best-performing configuration based on evaluation metrics.

title: Data Science Salaries Dashboard
description: Tableau dashboard analyzing data science salaries based on experience level, job title, company size, and location.
